modName: The Egg Of Time - Dwemer artifacts from Morrowind
summary: 10 dwemer artifacts from Morrowind. Will you be able to find them all?
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s29.postimg.org/b3qf9k9zr/egg.png[/img]


[center][b][size=4]NOTE: YOU'RE NOT ALLOWED TO USE THIS MOD TO MAKE A PROFIT
OR UPLOAD IT ON STEAM.[/size][/b][/center]



So, you are a treasure hunter and you want to collect even more dwemer clutter and items.
This mod brings 10 dwemer artifacts from The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind and some nostalgia.
There's only one of each item. Good luck finding them!
([i]Hint: check the dwemer ruins and [b]Markart[/b]h![/i]).

[b][i]REQUIREMENTS: Latest version of Skyrim + Dragonborn[/i][/b]


[b][i]ITEMs LIST:[/i][/b]
- Rare Dwemer Coherer
- Rare Dwemer Cylinder
- Rare Dwemer Mug
- Rare Dwemer Pitcher
- Rare Dwemer Bowl
- Rare Dwemer Goblet (1)
- Rare Dwemer Goblet (2)
- Rare Dwemer Schematics
- Book: The Egg Of Time
- Book: Divine Metaphysics



[b]SUGGESTED MODS[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35789/?]Shadow of Morrowind[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34022/?]Dwemer Coin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35854/?]Insanitys Dwemer Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30062/?]Dwemer Beards[/url]


[b]CREDITS[/b]

[list][*] Insanity: dwemer resources.[/list]
author: LorSakyamuni
